entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
